name: Lucy´s Fall
description:
ASD and space or arrows for movement, S and down arrow let you dodge some enemies, like the red demons, while not blue ones.

The demons kill you by seeying you, while the other enemies deal damage in contact.

The main idea of the game its to introduce key/doors and keypads to progress in the story. The papers in game in the future will provide codes for the keypads, and other papes will give you magic or power ups(coming soon).

By now you cant complete de main goal, just walk around and see the basic mecanics.
